title: The Great Reconstruction of the Eternal Citadel
flavor_text: The sheer volume of gold circulating within the realm has begun to destabilize the magical ley lines, causing physical structures in the capital to groan under the weight of metaphysical greed. To prevent a total planar collapse, the Grand Archivist has decreed that the surplus wealth must be sacrificed to the Great Arcane Forge to reinforce our world's foundations.
objective: Donate 1,000,000 Gold pieces to the Royal Construction Fund located in the city center.
reward: Exclusive Title: 'Architect of Order' and the 'Gilded Phoenix' flying mount.
